Perfect! I have gathered comprehensive information about Claude Code's settings. Let me create a complete reference document for you.

## Complete Claude Code Settings.json Reference

Here's an exhaustive list of ALL available configuration options for Claude Code's `settings.json` file (both global `~/.claude/settings.json` and project-level `.claude/settings.json`):

### Core Settings

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `$schema` | string | — | JSON schema URL for IDE validation (e.g., `"https://json.schemastore.org/claude-code-settings.json"`) |
| `model` | string | — | Override default model (`"opus"`, `"sonnet"`, `"haiku"`, `"default"`, `"opusplan"`, or full model name like `"claude-opus-4-6"`) |
| `availableModels` | array | — | Restrict selectable models users can choose from (e.g., `["sonnet", "haiku"]`) |
| `effortLevel` | string | `"high"` | Effort level for Opus 4.6 adaptive reasoning: `"low"`, `"medium"`, or `"high"` |
| `language` | string | — | Preferred response language (e.g., `"japanese"`, `"spanish"`, `"french"`, `"简体中文"`) |
| `outputStyle` | string | — | Output style preset (e.g., `"Explanatory"`, `"Concise"`, etc.) |

### Permissions & Security

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `permissions.allow` | array | — | Permission rules to allow tool use (e.g., `["Bash(npm run test*)", "Read(~/.zshrc)"]`) |
| `permissions.ask` | array | — | Rules requiring confirmation before tool use |
| `permissions.deny` | array | — | Rules to block tool use (e.g., `["Bash(rm*)", "Read(.env)"]`) |
| `permissions.additionalDirectories` | array | — | Additional working directories accessible to Claude (paths like `"/path/to/dir"`) |
| `permissions.defaultMode` | string | — | Default permission mode: `"acceptEdits"`, `"askEdits"`, or other modes |
| `permissions.disableBypassPermissionsMode` | string | — | Set to `"disable"` to prevent `--dangerously-skip-permissions` flag |
| `allowManagedPermissionRulesOnly` | boolean | — | (Managed only) Block user and project-level permission rules |

### Sandbox Configuration

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `sandbox.enabled` | boolean | `false` | Enable bash command sandboxing |
| `sandbox.autoAllowBashIfSandboxed` | boolean | `true` | Auto-approve bash commands when sandbox is enabled |
| `sandbox.excludedCommands` | array | — | Commands that run outside the sandbox (e.g., `["git", "npm"]`) |
| `sandbox.allowUnsandboxedCommands` | boolean | `true` | Allow `dangerouslyDisableSandbox` escape hatch for users |
| `sandbox.filesystem.allowWrite` | array | — | Paths where sandboxed commands can write (e.g., `["//tmp/build"]`) |
| `sandbox.filesystem.denyWrite` | array | — | Paths blocked from writes (e.g., `["~/.aws"]`) |
| `sandbox.filesystem.denyRead` | array | — | Paths blocked from reads (e.g., `["~/.env", "./secrets/**"]`) |
| `sandbox.network.allowedDomains` | array | — | Domains for outbound traffic (supports wildcards like `"*.github.com"`) |
| `sandbox.network.allowUnixSockets` | array | — | Unix socket paths allowed (e.g., `["~/.ssh/agent-socket"]`) |
| `sandbox.network.allowAllUnixSockets` | boolean | `false` | Allow all Unix socket connections |
| `sandbox.network.allowLocalBinding` | boolean | `false` | Allow binding to localhost ports (macOS) |
| `sandbox.network.httpProxyPort` | number | — | HTTP proxy port number |
| `sandbox.network.socksProxyPort` | number | — | SOCKS5 proxy port number |
| `sandbox.network.allowManagedDomainsOnly` | boolean | `false` | (Managed only) Only allow managed-approved domains |
| `sandbox.enableWeakerNestedSandbox` | boolean | `false` | Weaker sandbox for unprivileged Docker environments |

### Environment & Variables

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `env` | object | — | Environment variables for every session (e.g., `{"FOO": "bar", "NODE_ENV": "development"}`) |
| `apiKeyHelper` | string | — | Script path to generate dynamic auth values (e.g., `/bin/generate_temp_api_key.sh`) |
| `otelHeadersHelper` | string | — | Script path for dynamic OpenTelemetry headers |

### Git & Attribution

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `attribution.commit` | string | Default | Custom git commit message attribution |
| `attribution.pr` | string | Default | Custom pull request attribution message |
| `includeCoAuthoredBy` | boolean | `true` | (Deprecated) Include `co-authored-by` field in commits |

### Hooks & Automation

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `hooks` | object | — | Lifecycle event handlers. Events: `SessionStart`, `UserPromptSubmit`, `PreToolUse`, `PermissionRequest`, `PostToolUse`, `PostToolUseFailure`, `Notification`, `SubagentStart`, `SubagentStop`, `Stop`, `TeammateIdle`, `TaskCompleted`, `ConfigChange`, `WorktreeCreate`, `WorktreeRemove`, `PreCompact`, `SessionEnd` |
| `disableAllHooks` | boolean | — | Disable all hooks and status line |
| `allowManagedHooksOnly` | boolean | — | (Managed only) Only load managed and SDK hooks |
| `allowedHttpHookUrls` | array | — | Allowlist of HTTP hook URLs (supports `*` wildcard pattern) |
| `httpHookAllowedEnvVars` | array | — | Allowlist of environment variables for HTTP hook headers |

### File & Tool Configuration

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `fileSuggestion` | object | — | Custom script configuration for `@` file autocomplete |
| `respectGitignore` | boolean | `true` | Respect `.gitignore` patterns in `@` file picker |
| `statusLine` | object | — | Custom status line configuration for terminal display |

### MCP Servers

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `allowedMcpServers` | array | — | (Managed) Allowlist of MCP servers by name |
| `deniedMcpServers` | array | — | (Managed) Denylist of MCP servers by name |
| `allowManagedMcpServersOnly` | boolean | — | (Managed only) Only allow servers from managed allowlist |
| `enableAllProjectMcpServers` | boolean | — | Auto-approve all `.mcp.json` servers in the project |
| `enabledMcpjsonServers` | array | — | Specific `.mcp.json` servers to enable by name |
| `disabledMcpjsonServers` | array | — | Specific `.mcp.json` servers to disable by name |

### Plugin Management

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `enabledPlugins` | object | — | Enable/disable plugins by ID (e.g., `{"formatter@acme-tools": true, "linter@acme-tools": false}`) |
| `extraKnownMarketplaces` | object | — | Additional plugin marketplace configurations |
| `strictKnownMarketplaces` | array | — | (Managed only) Allowlist of plugin marketplace sources |
| `blockedMarketplaces` | array | — | (Managed only) Blocklist of marketplace sources |

### UI & Display

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `cleanupPeriodDays` | number | `30` | Delete inactive sessions after N days (0 = immediate cleanup) |
| `autoUpdatesChannel` | string | `"latest"` | Release channel: `"stable"` or `"latest"` |
| `spinnerVerbs` | object | — | Customize action verbs in spinner with `{"mode": "append", "verbs": ["Pondering", "Thinking"]}` |
| `spinnerTipsEnabled` | boolean | `true` | Show tips in the action spinner |
| `spinnerTipsOverride` | object | — | Custom spinner tips configuration |
| `terminalProgressBarEnabled` | boolean | `true` | Enable terminal progress bar display |
| `showTurnDuration` | boolean | `true` | Show turn duration messages |
| `prefersReducedMotion` | boolean | — | Reduce UI animations for accessibility |

### Authentication & Login

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `forceLoginMethod` | string | — | Force login type: `"claudeai"` or `"console"` |
| `forceLoginOrgUUID` | string | — | Auto-select organization by UUID |

### Thinking & Performance

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `alwaysThinkingEnabled` | boolean | — | Enable extended thinking by default for all sessions |
| `fastModePerSessionOptIn` | boolean | — | Require per-session opt-in for fast mode |

### AWS & Cloud

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `awsAuthRefresh` | string | — | Custom script to refresh AWS credentials |
| `awsCredentialExport` | string | — | Script outputting JSON AWS credentials |

### Planning & Tracking

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `plansDirectory` | string | `~/.claude/plans` | Directory where plan files are stored |

### Announcements

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `companyAnnouncements` | array | — | Messages shown at startup (rotated randomly per session) |

### Agent Teams

| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|-------|------|---------|-------------|
| `teammateMode` | string | `"auto"` | How teammates display: `"auto"`, `"in-process"`, or `"tmux"` |

### 建议配置

### 不太需要配置
